title: Super-Articulate: A Column Teaser
body:
Super-Articulate: A Column Teaser. @TroyBrownfield joins the GP team with the return of Super-Articulate! #captainmarvel #toys #actionfigures #hasbro

Greetings, GraphicyPolicy.com! This is Troy Brownfield. There’s a chance that you know my work from comics (like Blood Queen or Sparkshooter), or other comics sites, or The Saturday Evening Post. If not, you should know this: I’ve been collecting action figures since the 1970s. Yes, I’m old. Apart from that I’ve written about figures for outlets like Newtype USAmagazine and other comics sites.…

View On WordPress

summary: So the nearest AMC theater to me is like an hour and a half away and it's doing the Captain Marvel fan event where you get a...
body:
So the nearest AMC theater to me is like an hour and a half away and it’s doing the Captain Marvel fan event where you get a collectible coin, cameo popcorn, and exclusive bonus content before the movie.

But there is an IMAX theater an hour away that is less expensive and obviously less of a drive but no exclusive content or souvenirs.

What do y'all think? Which should I do?

(Yes there is a closer movie theater but it is small and kinda crappy. The prices are hella cheap though.)

summary: Captain Marvel Is a Superhero Origin Story "Told in Reverse"
title: Captain Marvel Is a Superhero Origin Story "Told in Reverse"
excerpt: This is going to be good.

body:
you know what i hate

the so called marvel “fans” who won’t see captain marvel because of brie larson,,,, because of the actress you won’t see it. thinking that they speak for everyone that they think none of us are going to see it and that marvel will lose every fan because of one movie that’s not even in theaters. just because you don’t want to watch it doesn’t mean all of us don’t want to watch it. like ffs speak for yourself and not the actual true marvel fans. you don’t want to see a movie fine by me, just don’t be a bitch about it to everyone else. and ive seen harsh comments under brie larson’s posts telling her to leave the movie and are telling her she doesn’t deserve the role. she reads your comments and it may hurt her feelings. hate the movie all you want but don’t be a bitch about it and don’t be rude to brie. two words: fuck you

title: Around the Tubes
body:
Check out some comic news and reviews from around the web in our morning roundup #comics

It was new comic book day yesterday! What’d you all get? What’d you like? What’d you dislike? Sound off in the comments below! While you think about that, here’s some comic news and reviews from around the web in our morning roundup.

The Comichron – The 2018 Two Thousand: A look at the 1,000 top-selling comics and graphic novels ordered by comic shops – For those that enjoy the horse race.

blog.name: theantelopeowl
blog.title: Made Of Stars & Magic
blog.description:
INFP, ace, hufflepuff, thunderbird, a writer, a princess, an avenger, a demigod. A fan of many things, but Chat Noir, Link and Tom Holland's Spider-Man sit above all others. Okay, add Thor and Scarlet Witch too. And Rapunzel and Belle and Tony Stark and LOKI ohgodicantforget loki!!

Anyway...I’m most often found staring up at the stars or drinking tea by the fire, trying to make sense of this crazy world.
